column4: Hello all :) I have a simple question I hope can be answered.  I have set up a wireless network in my house but I do not broadcast the network name.  Because of this a neighbor who has a broadcasted network always connects to my laptop when I turn on my pc.  How can I set my Ubuntu laptop to look for my unbroadcasted network first before looking for another?  Thanks :)
All you do then is tell you card not to use the manual configuration (reenable roaming mode)
Not with the current way that network manager works, sadly
